website_summaries.verdict: The one to pick for kids who love to simulate Paw Patrol action, but keep in mind that it's best suited for ages 2 to 5.
pros: An interactive toy that puts kids behind the controls of Ryder's rescue ATV
Action-packed fun like the show, thanks to buttons, signals, and horns, that simulate driving
cons: Older kids may lose interest quickly
Rare reports of faulty toys upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Everybody wins!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my three year old. He LOVES it! As a parent (because lets face it, that's who's buying it) I'll tell you what I love about it. #1 It comes with batteries HOORAY! #2 Not only can you turn it off and on, it has a volume controller (double hooray). #3 It does more than 3 things, so you aren't listening to the same sayings or songs over and over and over again. It's small enough that he can set it on his lap while we're driving and play with it as well. All in all, this was money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: moniq

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. It's actually for a little bit older kid - 3 or 4. It asks questions that asks you at to identify a pup then you're supposed to press the right button. It also asks you to honk the horn a certain number of times or turn the lights on or off, so it's not just playing with a driving toy, it's actually making them think.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly8

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit with 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about ordering this for my 3 year old son for his Birthday. I am glad I pulled the trigger because this is his favorite gift! He keeps it in the car and pretends to drive. Sounds effects are good and rather loud, there is a siren that had fooled me a few times as I was driving.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin H. Soto

customer_reviews.title: Paw Patrol
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for about six months. It still works and we haven't even changed the batteries! My daughter loves it. It's loud enough to hear. It says different things from the show. It even ask questions that the child can answer by turning the wheel or pushing a button. It's worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: ERICA

customer_reviews.title: A nice loud gift to give other people
customer_reviews.text: My nephews are still fighting over it. A nice loud gift to give other people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Paw Patrol Pups driver
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this driver toy. He plays it and seems to be learning some things when playing with it. I think there is only one complaint I have, if you touch it when not playing it, it will start to talk, and talk, and talk. Three of us have tried to find the off button but can't! It gets a little frustrating when trying to lay my son down for a nap and pick up the toys in the room and it begins to talk, I have to walk it to the next room so it will not be a distraction until it turns off. Otherwise, its a fun toy, and a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 1.5 year old son's Christmas present. He's been pressing the buttons, recognizes the characters when asked to locate a certain one, and moving the handles. Thankfully, this is not a loud, music never ending toy. The automatic shut off really helps save battery life and keeps me sane :) I'm sure as my son gets older, he'll get into pretending that he's driving around and calling the pups.
customer_reviews.author: JCheng

customer_reviews.title: Could be more interactive
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my four year old. Maybe he was a little too old for it because he exhausted the interactive portion within a day or two. My two year old, however, will listen to the instructions and follow the directions. But my older son is bored with the repetitive commands and rarely turns on the sound feature. Luckily, he has a good imagination and still plays like he's driving a motorcycle or ATV, so I'll still give it 4 stars! I'll recommend this toy for 1-3 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty sure he will enjoy this toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for a 4 year old who LOVES paw patrol. I'm pretty sure he will enjoy this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S. Moughler

customer_reviews.title: CHASE BUTTON DEFECTIVE INSTEAD SAYS "SHAKE"
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old loves dogs so he was sooo excited for this Paw Patrol toy. The handles work well and he is able to follow the directions given to him by ryder. The only and most important issue is CHASE!! It doesn't say his name as you can see by my video it says SHAKE!! Like so disappointed. Everything else works well and the volume is wonderful he enjoys the songs and the price was money worthwhile. But chase/shake issue makes me not satisfied to give a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loves it! She plays with it day and night. This is also perfect for when she’s in her car seat and is pretending to drive. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Laura G

customer_reviews.title: Too slidey!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s just me, but this toy needs rubber stoppers on bottom, it slides all over the place when playing with it. I am disappointed that I bought it, the kids lose interest quickly.

customer_reviews.title: my nephew loved it

My son likes to push it along the floor so it makes him think he actually driving. The toy can be played with on the floor, in the child’s lap or on a table. Has learning and recuse mission just like the paw patrol take.

product_meta.title: VTech Paw Patrol Pups to The Rescue Driver
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingGo for a drive on Ryder’s ATV with the PAW Patrol Pups to the Rescue Driver by VTech. Just like Ryder’s ATV, this interactive driver also transforms into a snowmobile and a hovercraft for exciting role-play. Turn the handlebars to steer the vehicle to save Mr. Porter’s van and more. Press the pup buttons to hear Ryder introduce all your favorite pups and tell you all about them. Go on exciting rescue missions and use the turn signals, check the rearview mirror and honk the horn to learn numbers, road safety and more. No job is too big, no pup is too small! Requires 2 AA batteries (batteries included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use). Intended for ages 2 to 5 years.
feature_bullets: Go for a drive on Ryder's ATV with the paw Patrol Pups to the rescue driver by VTech; features all of your favorite Paw Patrol Pups; games include exciting rescue missions just like the show
Pretend to go on adventures with Ryder on his ATV that also transforms into a snowmobile and hovercraft; complete missions like saving Mr. Porter’s van by steering the vehicle

Press the Pup buttons to hear Ryder's real voice introduce all your favorite Pups and tell you all about them; press the Ryder button to hear the Paw Patrol theme song and hear Ryder call the Pups to action

Use the turn signals, check the review mirror and honk the horn to learn numbers, road safety and more; No job is too big, no pup is too small.Requires 2 AA batteries (batteries included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use); intended for ages 2 to 5 years

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
